Story Rich game. The Cake is a lie!
Epic game from the old valve

Was on sale for $0.99, so I decided, why not at least try it? My brother also bought it, so that we could play some co-op together. 
The single player story, for as far as I've gotten, has kept me interested for both the story itself and problems to solve. Some puzzles can be harder to figure out then others and I will admit, I have looked up a few of them. However the game is fun by yourself, and only gets 10x better if you can play co-op with somebody. For only $0.99, it is definitely worth it.
El mejor cooperativo lejos, una de las obras maestras de valve.
Played through 3 times now, great game to come back to and remember the lore of portal.
Mind-boggling story-rich intuitive game that I will never forget.
Полагаю эта игра не устареет никогда.

Very fun game with challenging puzzles.

¡Me encanta! Nunca tuve la oportunidad de jugar este juego, aun así, siempre es bien nombrado sobretodo como juego multijugador. Ahora que lo tengo, de veras que puedo decir que me he perdido de algo bueno en este tiempo. 

La parte gráfica esta muy bien. En mi caso no tengo el mega computador y aun así corre súper bien tanto en modo campaña como en cooperativo. En cuanto a la historia principal, es muy entretenida. Te dirigen hacia un punto y de la nada te rompen esa rutina y en un dos por tres ya están en otra situación diferente, eso me encanta ya que no hace el juego predecible ni rutinario. De hecho, yo al inicio creía que seria simplemente crear portales, pasar los niveles solo o con tus amigos y pare de contar. Pero no, de hecho si entretiene bastante la historia. Los robots que van apareciendo tienen su personalidad y su por qué en la historia. Sobretodo los comentarios y la compañía de GLaDOS, me encanta.

Sinceramente si lo recomiendo mucho. Puedes pasar el tiempo jugando solo o con amigos así que se acomoda perfectamente a la situación.
very nice game, I wish valve would start making cool games again.

Portal 2 is an amazing sequel to the first portal game and it delivers more than just a continuation of a story. There's lots of secrets within this game as well. I highly recommend it puzzle lovers like myself.
Loads of fun. campaign is very funny and the co-op can be a real treat with the right sense of humor.
It's a fantastic puzzle game with amazing dialogue.
Just GLaDOS being GLaDOS makes this game worth it
Bro I think we might need more moon rocks.....

Valve was once a company that made games. they created a series called half life and did well with it. second game came around, and later the orange box including two games, TF2 and portal. The one that came out of the blue was portal, as it was a concept not really seen at the time. Then 4 years later came a sequel, which meant the team actually had time to make original models for the game and not recycle them from HL2... and they did it exceptionally well. The story was something i found hilarious and interesting, mechanics felt as solid as the last one, it expanded on the entire half life series as a whole, and it sustained itself with the perpetual testing initiative. i give this a good 5/5 for having the greatest gameplay and community. with that said i recommend the unreal chamber series to truly have your head be turned upsidedown for how much you can change the game.

Great game to pass time and play with friends in cimmunity test chambers, overall story is ok not the best but enjoyable. new mechanics and test building make the game great for people who like portal or are creative in level design.
Lotsa fun, the story is very good and the Co-op is fine

Great sequel to the first game, and just as funny. There's a lot more story and more elements to the puzzles. Also the co-op mode is a lot of fun to mess around with a friend with well thought out levels. The dialogue and character interactions are hilarious, it definitely  is a fantastic sequel that doesn't let the original down.
Sem duvidas um dos melhores jogos da VALVE.
Excellent sequel to the original, it improves on what made its predecessor fun and greatly expands the scale. This is a must play for any gamer.
